title: Topic 001 Question 137
body: You are developing a new application and are looking for a Jenkins installation to build and deploy your source code. You want to automate the installation as quickly and easily as possible. What should you do?
options: Deploy Jenkins through the Google Cloud Marketplace.
Create a new Compute Engine instance. Run the Jenkins executable.
Create a new Kubernetes Engine cluster. Create a deployment for the Jenkins image.
Create an instance template with the Jenkins executable. Create a managed instance group with this template.
